----

=== Minutes ===
* Introductions were held
* Discussion on Ubuntu Hours - location, howto, who attends
* UbuntuGlobalJam plans were discussed
** Kwartzlab will host <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-ca/1498/detail/|Ubuntu Global Jam Waterloo]]</nowiki>
* Discussion is beginning for Ubuntu Release Parties
